Text: Rated R for strong violence, language, sexual content, some nudity and drug material.

I KNOW you ALWAYS have the best copy avail. So many thanks. Didn't see a trailer on Imbd but I have high hopes for an old fashioned festival of brutality! Something sorely lacking when Evry F***ing movie is cut to pg13 to maximize profit. Probably partially OUR Fault LOL! Seems stars have to go overseas to indulge their bloodlust, let's hope they had fun.
